title: Hey wat about nerfing teemo, entirely (or at least his E)
body: Wat the title says, right ur comments :P

replies.body: Ik that he's a troll pick (and i dont main Yi, i must change my fuking username) it's just he's soo fuking annoying, and in my nasus game i was countered so hardcore, like he was always and my jg didn't really do much aggressive and so i want rito to completely nerf something pls, btw Riso i didn't literary go to NA boards and see that crappy post xD

riso. that's new.
OP plays Yi, no wonder he wants nerfs to the champion that counters him.
Teemo is not overpowered, its just his kit is annoying to play against... Damn mushrooms
hes fkn garbage manifested in champion form lol, unplayable after the completely unneeded nerf to his ultimate.
But he's already terrible... Like he's legit a troll pick, all he does is irritate the enemy and force them to *gasp* upgrade their trinkets and render his ult useless
he's annoying, but he's not op.
nah there are more pressing things to worry about than teemo, as is you can mostly counter him decently
